fields.name: AppLocation
fields.description: The SAP monitor resources will be deployed in the SAP monitoring region. The subnet region should be same as the SAP monitoring region.

fields.name: LogAnalyticsWorkspaceArmId
fields.description: The ARM ID of the Log Analytics Workspace that is used for SAP monitoring.

fields.name: MonitorSubnet
fields.description: The subnet which the SAP monitor will be deployed in

fields.name: MsiArmId
fields.description: The ARM ID of the MSI used for SAP monitoring.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: State of provisioning of the SAP monitor.

fields.name: RoutingPreference
fields.description: Sets the routing preference of the SAP monitor. By default only RFC1918 traffic is routed to the customer VNET.

fields.name: StorageAccountArmId
fields.description: The ARM ID of the Storage account used for SAP monitoring.

fields.name: ZoneRedundancyPreference
fields.description: Sets the preference for zone redundancy on resources created for the SAP monitor. By default resources will be created which do not support zone redundancy.
